alert.note: Alert for Chester; Henderson; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 12:32PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Henderson, north central McNairy and Chester Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Henderson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Jacks Creek, Mifflin, Finger, Enville, Hickory Corners, Roby, Montezuma, Cabo, Middle Fork and Huron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
